Class TileGsonMarshal

  • java.lang.Object

    public class TileGsonMarshal
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<Tile>, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Tile>
    Responsible for serializing and deserializing the abstract Tile class.

    Konrad LindenBach, James Cadek
